name: City Park & Botanical Gardens
description: A beautiful 50-acre park featuring themed gardens, walking trails, and seasonal flower displays. Perfect for family picnics and outdoor activities.

name: Historic Downtown District
address: Main Street between 1st and 5th, Your City
description: Explore our charming historic downtown with unique shops, restaurants, and beautifully preserved 19th-century architecture.

name: Science & Technology Museum
description: Interactive exhibits showcasing scientific discoveries and technological innovations. Great for visitors of all ages with hands-on learning experiences.

name: Riverside Trail System
address: Access points along River Road, Your City
description: 15 miles of paved trails following the scenic riverfront. Popular for walking, running, and cycling with beautiful views year-round.

name: Performing Arts Center
description: State-of-the-art venue hosting Broadway shows, concerts, and local performances. Home to the city's symphony and ballet companies.

name: Farmers Market
description: Open every Saturday with fresh local produce, artisan foods, and handmade crafts. A community gathering spot since 1985.

name: Sports Complex
description: Modern facility with multiple sports fields, indoor courts, and an Olympic-sized swimming pool. Host to regional tournaments and community events.

name: Heritage Museum
description: Discover the rich history of our area through interactive exhibits, historical artifacts, and guided tours of restored pioneer buildings.
